semantics.name: width
semantics.label: Width
semantics.description: Width of iFrame in CSS compliant format. Default: "500px"

semantics.name: minWidth
semantics.label: Minimum width
semantics.description: Minimum width of iFrame in CSS compliant format. Default: "300px"

semantics.name: height
semantics.label: Height
semantics.description: Height of iFrame in CSS compliant format. Default: "500px"

semantics.name: source
semantics.label: Source
semantics.description: URI to external document, or path to document found inside H5P (under /content)

semantics.name: resizeSupported
semantics.label: Resize supported
semantics.description: If enabled, fullscreen button will be displayed, and H5P will be resized to fit it's surroundings
